name: Intro
text:
Geoff defeated the 5 Trials today.

We tried stopping him from going in, though he was too confident that he could beat it.

We’ve watched the footage of him beating it over and over again. There was some kind of odd interference that corrupted the video, making it hard to see what’s going on. But from we understand, it seems Geoff just… Disappears at the end. We can’t contact him through the radio either.
